lines.text: Most guys first time out they try to score, they expect it. And some of them get pretty nasty if they don't get it. So by the 2nd time it's either fuck or forget it.
In my neighbourhood if you didn't fight you were a fruit. In prison if you didn't fight you spread ass.
Teaching's a waste of time, I'm writing a novel.
Isn't everybody.
Getting divorced too.
Isn't everybody.
Me, queer! Jesus, I'm a married man, I've got 2 kids and a very expensive mistress. I'm an animal.
That's why you go to gay bars ?
When your nightlife interferes with your daylife...
I'm a pitcher not a catcher, and don't you ever forget that.
Honeymoon? I thought you went to get an abortion!
We're all hurt someplace and we're all looking for a painkiller.

First thing, on with the tv. Next - nothing. Just sit there on the bed watching the porno movie, I honest to God expect he's going to bring out a bag of popcorn. Finally, the big moment. He doesn't even take off his pants. And all the time he's doing it to me, he's watching them do it on tv.
What are you hooked on?
Anything I can get.
Confidentially, with me... one's too many and a million's not enough.
I got the same problem with men.
I'm alone, I'm not lonely. I'm depressed - you're depressing me.
Kiss my ass.
I did.
Is that why you don't wash the dishes, because the roaches are hungry?
Why else?
Everybody's taking something or they'd never make it till morning.
Talk about amateur, played for a hooker by a square and ripped off as a sucker by a dick.
I don't believe in the future.
Go set the world on fire.
On a couple of bucks!
Find a smaller world.
By parted lovers it is writ/Oh darling, thou art still a shit.
